amendment.description: Page 47, after line 2, insert the following new section: ? SEC. 503. None of the funds made available by this Act from the Nuclear Waste Fund may be used to carry out the Global Nuclear Energy Partnership program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new section at the end of the bill to prohibit any of the funds made available by the Act for the Nuclear Waste Fund from being used to carry out the Global Nuclear Energy Partnership program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Barton (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
